post_title: Looking for name at top t206's.  I'll buy or trade for yours
post_content: The journey continues.  205/520.  Not bad for about a ten year effort. Let me know what you have.  Please no slivers of a name on top.  I need at least 3/4's of the name.

[quote name="Phillies*phan" post=1299452] You wouldn't believe the prying it takes to get these cards from some people.[/QUOTE]


I feel like that is somewhat aimed at me lol

I've got this trio. I really don't want to get rid of them but I might if I liked the trade.

I'm working on T206 portraits so the Jordan and Davidson are a part of that project. The Bergen I've just been holding onto because it's got the full name on top and a Tolstoi back... I just like it I guess. Bergen just came back from SGC and they really hammered me on the grade. I'm not seeing anything with the naked eye that would cause it to be that low?

Bergen - FRONT: full name at top, can barely see a sliver of the name on bottom, BACK: full factory on bottom, can barely see a sliver of factory on top

Jordan - FRONT: full name at top, about 1/3 of name on bottom

Davidson - FRONT: full name at top, almost full name at bottom, BACK: full factory  on top and on bottom

Sorry for the crappy cell phone pic... my scanner is at work.

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/cards/f8374ddf-bae2-4aee-82e0-14f2ac02e5b7_zpse4728602.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/cards/9487c4b0-a7b9-4003-90cf-61da33c813b5_zps9621d4e5.jpg[/IMG]

This is a very cool way to collect an already famous set. I'd love to see it displayed sometime in a prominent location when you complete it.

Possible at that time get it all graded just to have a vanity name added to the flip - "NAMES ON TOP" would be a sweet add.

A cool way to collect!
Doug - I emailed you about a Crawford name on top that I'd be willing to part with if you need/want it.

This is what I'm talking about Boys!!
  Thanks to to ZachS and Leighton from JustCollect.  Johnny's cards not pictured but thanks to you to.
One if my new favs

Thanks! my friend! you deserve them......this is a great project and you have made a ton of progress.....:)......you will complete what I originally set out to do until the "error" bug bit me:)

I will keep searching my friend, but you have all of mine now:D

[quote name="Phillies*phan" post=1305147]One if my new favs[/QUOTE]


Love the conroy

Zach- I used to own the Jordan and Davidson...got them from a board member a while back. Nice examples.

Great collection, Doug!

[quote name="MVSNYC" post=1305378]Zach- I used to own the Jordan and Davidson...got them from a board member a while back. Nice examples.

Great collection, Doug![/QUOTE]


From me, I believe.   And I think I got the Jordan from Lee Behrens.  I believe the Davidson was a raw eBay find.

[quote name="MVSNYC" post=1305378]Zach- I used to own the Jordan and Davidson...got them from a board member a while back. Nice examples.

Great collection, Doug![/QUOTE]

I'm going to miss them but I think they found a good home. Doug got a couple more name on tops for his collection and we were able to work out a good trade to put some portraits in my collection.
These are great! It seems there are a million different ways to collect these cards.

The Hound came through with another and picked up a few on eBay.  Included was the Oberlin that I had a snipe set on but a few hours before it was to end Painthistorian ended it and reposted with a buy it now for $30 less than my snipe.  Fishy but saved me some money.  Still looking for about 400 more.

Doug, I don't know if you saw this, or if you'd even be interested anymore having just acquired a Bergen. But Tom's selling one with a half name at the top. 

[url]http://net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=192468[/url]

Usually pay about $50-$150 for my cards depending on how much name is showing and I still like them in nice condition but these are so rare Ill take any condition.  A few I've seen but not in time are Bates, Malarkey, McBride, and Dougherty portrait.  If you bought any of these, let me trade you one of my doubles.  I have some real nice ones not shown in the original post.
Pics in the original post have been updated.  Pretty good trade bait if you ask me.

PWCC has one in his most recent eBay auction... Good luck!

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/400780750369?_trksid=p2055119.m1438.l2649&ssPageName=STRK%3AMEBIDX%3AIT[/url]
Still looking for cards with at least 3/4's of the top name.   [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]
Free up some money for a nice gift for your wife.  sell me your name at top.
I have this one I would part with.
Still looking.
Here's one I found if you are interested.
Ready for a new one!!
bump

Have  this Wagner I would be willing to part with trade or sell doesnt matter to me.
Let me know if you are interested. Cool collection!
One year bump.  Please no half names.

[quote name="Phillies*phan" post=1633179]One year bump.  Please no half names.[/QUOTE]

Doug, 


Sending a PM now.

Thank you :)

Doug,

Do you have a list or an updated photo gallery?
I believe I have a Dutch Revelle that I would part with.
Bump.  Up to 160/520
Still going.  Up to 172 different.  Lets see what you got.  I got plenty of doubles to trade if you just want one in your collection.
Thanks to everyone who's been helping me.  Still looking to add or upgrade.
4 Month Bump.  Please email [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]
id love to see the monster set with "name at top"   psa graded "doug collection":)
Slowly but surely.  Up to 180.  Come on guys.  Dig em up.
looking to buy or trade.  I have some real nice doubles if you just want an example to own.
but gauging your interest
Still Looking
bump
Send PM if interested in trading for this Bender

Bump for any new folks that don't know I'm doing a set with name at tops.  Just did a new count and I'm up to 201!! It's been tough sledding lately so if you think you have one hidden away, dig it up PLEASE.
Standard 2 year bump  These name at tops are getting hard to find.  Probably cuz i have over 200 now.
someone sell me a name at top please.  email at [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]

Just seeing this for the first time.

Very cool run and looking forward to following your progress.

Nice work!
Last bump produced a couple nice ones.  Thanks guys.  Still need about 300 to finish the set.  Going on 13 years now.
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=610614&d=1708188577[/IMG]

Cool cards but, this proves that alcohol wasnt banned at this time, these drunk sum of mitches, well.....lol  

truly great cards
Still looking and buying.
I was looking at my collection the other day. I saw a horizontal with the name at “top”. Forget who it was…fun card though…
